Key: Oh, Tohka...

(So, Tohka really did head to class early.
How unlike her...)
*yaaaawn*...

(Whoa, that's a big yawn. How unflattering.
Oh, well. I guess that's Tohka for you.)
Yo, Tohka. Did you have a late night?
Sh-Shido?!
Hm? What's up? Don't act so surprised.
Y-Yeah, you're right! Sorry!

Someone's hyper today. Did something
happen?
N-Nothing!
Okay then... Huh? What's up with your finger?
Hm?

Well, you've got bandages all over your
hands.
THTHTHTHTHTHis is nothing! I was practicing—
Practicing? For what?

N...! NOTHING! Just... this doesn't concern
you, Shido!
O-Okay...

(I wonder... if Tohka was the one shuffling
around late last night.)

Well, be careful, okay Tohka? I don't want
to see you get hurt.
O-Okay... I will try my best.

(Well, she seems to be working hard. If there's
something she doesn't want me to know,
I guess I should leave her be for a while.)

(As the early summer rays seeped through
the blinds, I grew sleepy, basking in the
perfectly air-conditioned classroom.)

(Fighting the urge to sleep felt like a futile
effort...)

(However, as Sports Day ended, we were
fast approaching testing.)

(I want to pay attention, even if I have to
take photos of the blackboard.)

(Especially for someone like me, who barely
studies all year and depends on cramming, I
gotta focus.)

(But reality is cruel. Unlike the idealized
version in my head, students succumbed to
the temptation to nap one after the other.)

(And finally, the demonic hands of slumber
wrapped themselves around me...)

(Just as I realized what was happening,
I sunk into a deep, deep sleep...)
Zzz...
